attributes.action: Support our Athletes. Brilliant performance yet again.
attributes.additional_details: After another glittering performance by the home nations athletes, it's about time we supported and fully funded them. Footballers get £millions and can't use two feet, so why don't we sponsor the hero's who really work to achieve greatness for the England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland. Surely it wouldn't cost much and pride would be restored in our nations.
